dcterms:description: BCI Competition IV 2a data is commonly used in motor imagery studies, where EEG signals are recorded from subjects performing motor imagery tasks based on visual cues. The dataset includes EEG data from nine subjects imagining hand movements corresponding to displayed cues.
dcterms:title: BCI Competition IV 2a data
